mapper.insert:
insert into rm_task_info( TASK_NAME, TASK_CONTENT, END_TIME, REL_VENUES_ID, EMERGENCY_LEVEL, TASK_PICTURE, TASK_VIDEO, LAUNCH_PERSON, HANDLE_PERSON, HANDLE_RESULTS, HANDLE_TIME, TASK_TYPE, PROC_INST_ID, FLOW_TYPE, PART_NUM, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON ) values ( #{taskName}, #{taskContent}, #{endTime}, #{relVenuesId}, #{emergencyLevel}, #{taskPicture}, #{taskVideo}, #{launchPerson}, #{handlePerson}, #{handleResults}, #{handleTime}, #{taskType}, #{procInstId}, #{flowType}, #{partNum}, #{responsiblePerson}
)
mapper.sql: TASK_NAME as taskName, TASK_CONTENT as taskContent, END_TIME as endTime, REL_VENUES_ID as relVenuesId, EMERGENCY_LEVEL as emergencyLevel, TASK_PICTURE as taskPicture, TASK_VIDEO as taskVideo, LAUNCH_PERSON as launchPerson, HANDLE_PERSON as handlePerson, HANDLE_RESULTS as handleResults, HANDLE_TIME as handleTime, TASK_TYPE as taskType, PROC_INST_ID as procInstId
mapper.select: select ifnull(sta.startSum+sta.reportSum+sta.handleSum,0) as allSum, ifnull(sta.startSum,0) as startSum, ifnull(sta.reportSum+sta.handleSum,0) as executeNum from (select SUM(CASE WHEN d.TYPE_ = 'starter' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS startSum, SUM(CASE WHEN d.TYPE_ = 'participant' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reportSum, (select count(t.TASK_ID) from rm_task_info t where t.HANDLE_PERSON=d.user_id_) as handleSum from act_hi_identitylink d where user_id_ =#{loginNm} ) sta
